name: Green Beans and Ham
author: dalzac
summary: A one-pot dish of green beans, red new potatoes, onions, and ham steak. My husband loves this and would eat it every night if he could.
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) ham steak, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 ½ pounds red new potatoes, halved
1 pound fresh green beans, trimmed and halved
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place ham steak, potatoes, green beans, onion, and butter in a large pot with just enough water to cover
Season with salt and pepper; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes
